BewhY

Korean: 비와이

Blood type:
A
Height:
6' (182 cm)

Introduction

BewhY is a South Korean rapper. Initially he chose 'BY' as a stage name, but changed it to 'BewhY' to give a meaning to the name.

He won first place on Show Me the Money 5 in 2016. Rapper C JAMM is his old friend from high school. BewhY is also well known for being a devout Christian.

He found his own hip-hop label DEJAVU GROUP in 2017.

In October 2020, Bewhy married his non-celebrity girlfriend, with whom he had been dating for 8 years.

He is considered as one of the fastest rappers in the industry and history.
